<div class="collapsible-content section-spacing section-spacing--disable-bottom">
	
<div class="section-header">
	
		<h2 class="h3">FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)</h2>
		
		
</div>


	<div class="row">
		<div class="small-12 columns">
			<div class="collapsible-content__inner"><collapsible-row class="accordion" >
					<details id="Details-collapsible_tab_7BtPgf-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy" >
						<summary>
							What material is AdaptAIR?
							<span></span>
						</summary>
						<div class="accordion__content accordion__content rte collapsible__content" id="Accordion-collapsible_tab_7BtPgf-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy">
							<p><strong>The AdaptAIR shipping container vent adapter is 20-gauge, single-piece stamped steel coated in an industrial gray epoxy. We engineered this product to become structurally supportive when installed.</strong></p>
							
						</div>
					</details>
				</collapsible-row><collapsible-row class="accordion" >
					<details id="Details-collapsible_tab_T74K3a-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy" >
						<summary>
							What is included with AdaptAIR for installation?
							<span></span>
						</summary>
						<div class="accordion__content accordion__content rte collapsible__content" id="Accordion-collapsible_tab_T74K3a-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy">
							<p><strong>Each product comes with step-by-step photo instructions, (2) drill bits, (1) driver bit, (30) screws, (30) rubber tips, and (1) abrasive pad. (Roofing adhesive and turbines are sold separately).</strong></p>
							
						</div>
					</details>
				</collapsible-row><collapsible-row class="accordion" >
					<details id="Details-collapsible_tab_Pnzfdq-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy" >
						<summary>
							What size turbine fits on AdaptAIR?
							<span></span>
						</summary>
						<div class="accordion__content accordion__content rte collapsible__content" id="Accordion-collapsible_tab_Pnzfdq-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy">
							<p><strong>AdaptAIR will fit any standard 12-inch ventilation, including Whirlybird turbine vents, static vents, and solar powered vents. If the vent has a 12-inch collar, it will fit AdaptAIR.</strong></p>
							
						</div>
					</details>
				</collapsible-row><collapsible-row class="accordion" >
					<details id="Details-collapsible_tab_rDkgCi-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy" >
						<summary>
							Does AdaptAIR include a turbine vent?
							<span></span>
						</summary>
						<div class="accordion__content accordion__content rte collapsible__content" id="Accordion-collapsible_tab_rDkgCi-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy">
							<p><strong>We designed a wind turbine specifically for AdaptAIR. You can buy the AdaptAIR and turbine separately or you can select the complete system.</strong></p>
							
						</div>
					</details>
				</collapsible-row><collapsible-row class="accordion" >
					<details id="Details-collapsible_tab_wcmect-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy" >
						<summary>
							Does this product have a warranty?
							<span></span>
						</summary>
						<div class="accordion__content accordion__content rte collapsible__content" id="Accordion-collapsible_tab_wcmect-template--21816320164024__collapsible_content_q3FbVy">
							<p><strong>We offer a no-hassle lifetime guarantee on all of our products. If you have any issues, please contact us and we will resolve it for you!</strong></p>
							
						</div>
					</details>
				</collapsible-row></div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

sections.text: FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA
Elegantly designed accessories to improve your Conex shipping container.

Container Creations makes patented shipping container vents and skylights that are easy to install and extremely effective for improving your Conex container.  Heat and condensation are detrimental to the possessions inside your container. That's why AdaptAIR™ was designed to enhance ventilation and create unmatched airflow through your shipping container roof.
SKYLIGHT FOR SHIPPING CONTAINERS

Boost natural light into the darkest corners of your Conex shipping container. SkyDOME™ is designed with a thick polycarbonate dome and diamond cut surface to create the highest refraction of light in your container.
COMPLETE VENTILATION SYSTEM
Combine our best selling AdaptAIR™ vent adapter with our custom designed wind turbine for the complete ventilation system. This system creates the most roof ventilation of any product on the market.

Measure the ROOF of your container, which is different than the side walls. Please use the following guidelines to measure the distance between corrugation on your own container's roof. 1/2 inch variation is acceptable.
Only adapters with this type of corrugation are available for order.
No hassle guarantee on fit or quality. Molded with tight tolerances to match your container roof corrugation.
Carefully crafted step-by-step photo instructions to ensure you install our products with confidence.
Only product is the only adapter in the world that directly fits full size 12-inch vent systems.
We only send a few emails per year for major sales or product releases!
Our products are built to battle the elements. As a marine engineer for 20 years, the founder of Container Creations set out to produce products with zero compromise on water entry.
I ordered a second set immediately after I opened the box.
This product is well made, a perfect fit, wonderful instructions.
You cannot find businesses that have pride in what they sell like these guys.
Container Creations makes premium products for converting your container with do-it-yourself adapters and clear instructions for installation.
The AdaptAIR shipping container vent adapter is 20-gauge, single-piece stamped steel coated in an industrial gray epoxy. We engineered this product to become structurally supportive when installed.
Each product comes with step-by-step photo instructions, (2) drill bits, (1) driver bit, (30) screws, (30) rubber tips, and (1) abrasive pad. (Roofing adhesive and turbines are sold separately).
AdaptAIR will fit any standard 12-inch ventilation, including Whirlybird turbine vents, static vents, and solar powered vents. If the vent has a 12-inch collar, it will fit AdaptAIR.
We designed a wind turbine specifically for AdaptAIR. You can buy the AdaptAIR and turbine separately or you can select the complete system.
We offer a no-hassle lifetime guarantee on all of our products. If you have any issues, please contact us and we will resolve it for you!
For complete detailed step-by-step instructions and a full length video, please go to our INSTALLATION page. The installation process is the same for AdaptAIR and SkyDOME.
We offer all of the essentials for energy savings and are geared towards maximizing ventilation capacity.
© 2026 Container Creations, All rights reserved.

AdaptAIR shipping container vent adapters are 20-gauge, single-piece stamped steel coated in an industrial gray epoxy.
Each product comes with step-by-step photo instructions, (2) drill bits, (1) driver bit, (30) screws, (30) rubber tips, and (1) abrasive pad. (Roofing adhesive and turbines are sold separately).
AdaptAIR will fit any standard 12-inch ventilation, including Whirlybird turbine vents, static vents, and solar powered vents. If the vent has a 12-inch collar, it will fit AdaptAIR.
We do not manufacture turbine vents, but they can get be easily purchased online or at your local hardware store or roofing supply.
We offer a no-hassle lifetime guarantee on all ventilation adapters.

Your cart is currently empty.
FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA

The installation process should take less than 30 minutes once you have everything in place. Before proceeding, please test the fit of your 12” turbine (sold separately) on the AdaptAIR adapter. It should fit perfectly with no gaps or difficulty sliding the vent over the curb mount. If it does not fit, do not proceed and contact us.
Read the complete instructions and watch our step-by-step instructional installation video:
Roof Vent Adapter Installation Video
Every cargo container roof has slight deviations in the corrugated spacing, although for the most part, they are even. Our roof vent adapter was designed to accommodate minor deviations.
Determine adapter location on roof prior to installation. Check various locations to find the area that fits best.
Avoid seams and any sections that appear uneven due to dents or warping.
If it is clear that the adapter does not fit the roof corrugation, do not proceed. Contact us and we will advise you on the next steps.
Place the adapter in your selected location and carefully pencil an outline along the entire outside edge to mark the adapter location.
The adapter will conform to the container even if it does not seat perfectly. Make sure the corrugations are centered as best as possible. If it is not perfect, you can still proceed.
You will now use two screws to hold the adapter in place. Drill a hole in a middle corrugation and install a screw to hold the adapter in place.
On the opposite side of the installed screw, drill a hole and install a second screw to hold the adapter in place. Once the adapter is steady, drill all remaining holes. Then remove the two screws.

Move the adapter aside and take note of which way it is facing. When installing, the unit should face the same way to match the drilled holes (you can mark the roof and the adapter edges with pieces of tape to signify what direction the adapter is facing. This is important as the holes you drilled may not be in the exact same place side to side).Using painters masking tape, mask approximately 1⁄4” outside of the pencil line.
With the supplied abrasive pad, thoroughly scuff the roof from the tape line to a minimum of 2” towards the center to prepare the roof to bond with the adhesive.

Make a new pencil outline for the hole you will cut. To do this, use the existing pencil outline you created as a guide. Measure inside approximately 2” from that pencil outline toward the center from all sides and mark.
Connect all pencil marks to create a 12” x 12” square inside the original pencil outline. This will be the hole that you will cut.
If the shipping container has been retrofitted with electricity or gas, make sure not to cut through the wires or pipes. Make sure no one is standing below the hole when cutting.
We highly recommend using a grinder with a maximum 1/8” thick cutting disc. Start your cuts in two corners. Then follow the pencil lines to cut the 12” x 12” hole.

If you do not have a grinder, you can also use a reciprocating saw.  You can use a drill and bit the same size as your reciprocating blade to start your corners. Then follow the pencil lines to cut the hole.
ONLY USE A PROFESSIONAL GRADE METAL ROOFING ADHESIVE. Follow the manufacturer’s recommendation for application.
Prep the area around all drilled screw holes by wiping down with alcohol to remove dust, debris or oils.
Apply a 3/8” bead on top of all drilled holes, and a second, parallel 3/8” bead just outside of the first bead.

It is important to use enough adhesive to make a good seal. There should not be any thin areas as water will find its way through. Adhesive should ooze from 100% of all side edges when the screws are tightened (Step 9). If you have some minor visible voids in adhesive, it is perfectly acceptable to backfill thoroughly with your sealant.

The roof adhesive can be cleaned up with isopropyl alcohol before it has fully dried. Do not attempt to clean off the adhesive with water, as this will cause it to cure. If you are in a very dry location, mist the adhesive with water to cure. Once fully dried it will be very difficult to remove.
Using care, center the roof vent by lining it up with the pencil outline and the previously marked holes, and ensure that the adapter is facing the same direction as you originally traced it.
With the screws provided in the installation kit, screw in the adapter by first loosely setting screws into holes.
Starting with the center corrugations, tighten the screws half way.

Tighten all of the screws alternating from one side to the next so that the flashing seats uniformly. If installed properly, there will be adhesive visible outside the flashing after the unit is screwed down to the roof.

Use a putty knife or old credit card to scrape up the excess adhesive. Then wipe with isopropyl alcohol to remove any remaining adhesive. Do not attempt to clean off the adhesive with water, as this will cause the adhesive to cure before cleanup is complete.

The adapter will fit any vent (not included) with a 12-inch collar. You can use a Whirlybird turbine vent, solar vent, or static vent. We recommend purchasing a 12-inch galvanized steel internally-braced wind turbine from your local hardware store or online.
The screws provided with the installation kit are self-tapping and can be screwed directly through the turbine vent mounting holes into the curb adapter lip.

To ensure your safety, always use eyewear and hearing protection. Keep your hands clear of blades, grinding discs and drill bits. If you are not proficient in the use of power tools, you should find professional help to cut the holes.
The installation kit includes:
Cutting tool required for installation:Grinder with 1/8" max thickness abrasive cutoff wheel.
If you do not have a grinder, you can use:Reciprocating saw with metal cutting blade.
Drill bit the same diameter as reciprocating blade to start your cut opening.
Additional tools and materials required:

pages.title: American Express

sections.text: FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA
SkyDOME™ is an easy-to-install, 12-inch polycarbonate skylight for adding natural light to the corrugated roof of your Conex shipping container.

SkyDOME™ is an innovative daylight-enhancing dome that will light from any angle all year long. Designed to install quickly, you can bring much needed light to the darkest corners of your shipping container. The 4mm thick injection molded dome has a diamond cut surface allow the greatest refraction of light without creating any hot spots.
Each skylight includes an installation kit:
FOR BEST RESULTS, USE A PROFESSIONAL GRADE STRUCTURAL ADHESIVE.  WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND CHEM LINK M1 (Click here for link to Amazon)
PRECISE DESIGN • Only product is designed for standard 3.5" ribbing on Conex shipping container roof corrugation. Please refer to our measurement chart.
DO-IT-YOURSELF • Includes complete installation kit and instructions for easy installation.
BLOCKS UVA & UVB RAYS • Polycarbonate has built in protection against damaging UV rays.
REPLACEABLE DOME & GASKET • If you ever need to replace the dome on your SkyDome™, we offer a replacement kit so you don't need to remove the metal adapter from your container.
MOLDED STEEL • One piece stamped steel coated in gray epoxy for a lifetime guarantee.
EPOXY COATING • Durable industrial grade coating far exceeds the coating used on shipping containers. Epoxy can be coated with any roof paint or coating.
GUARANTEED FOR THE LIFE OF YOUR CONTAINER
We offer all of the essentials for energy savings and are geared towards maximizing ventilation capacity.

<div class="product-short-description rte" ><p><strong>SkyDOME™ is an easy-to-install, 12-inch polycarbonate skylight for adding natural light to the corrugated roof of your Conex shipping container.</strong><strong></strong></p>
<p>SkyDOME™ is an innovative daylight-enhancing dome that will light from any angle all year long. Designed to install quickly, you can bring much needed light to the darkest corners of your shipping container. The 4mm thick injection molded dome has a diamond cut surface allow the greatest refraction of light without creating any hot spots.</p>
<p><strong>Each skylight includes an installation kit:</strong><br></p>
<ul>
<li>Step-by-step photo instructions</li>
<li>(2) drill bits</li>
<li>(1) driver bit</li>
<li>(30) screws</li>
<li>(30) rubber tips for screw points</li>
<li>Abrasive pad</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>FOR BEST RESULTS, USE A PROFESSIONAL GRADE STRUCTURAL ADHESIVE.  WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND CHEM LINK M1 (<a rel="noopener" title="Amazon - Chem Link M1" href="https://a.co/d/hjKVcYf" target="_blank">Click here for link to Amazon</a>)</strong></p>
<p><meta charset="utf-8"><strong>------------------------------------------</strong></p>
<p><strong>PRECISE DESIGN</strong> • Only product is designed for standard 3.5" ribbing on Conex shipping container roof corrugation. Please refer to our measurement chart.</p>
<p><strong>DO-IT-YOURSELF</strong> • Includes complete installation kit and instructions for easy installation.</p>
<p><meta charset="utf-8"><strong>BLOCKS UVA & UVB RAYS</strong> • Polycarbonate has built in protection against damaging UV rays.</p>
<p><strong>REPLACEABLE DOME & GASKET</strong> • If you ever need to replace the dome on your SkyDome™, we offer a replacement kit so you don't need to remove the metal adapter from your container.</p>
<p><strong>MOLDED STEEL</strong> • One piece stamped steel coated in gray epoxy for a lifetime guarantee.</p>
<p><strong>EPOXY COATING</strong> • <meta charset="utf-8">Durable industrial grade coating far exceeds the coating used on shipping containers. <meta charset="utf-8">Epoxy can be coated with any roof paint or coating.</p>
<p><meta charset="utf-8"><strong>GUARANTEED FOR THE LIFE OF YOUR CONTAINER</strong></p></div><collapsible-row class="product__accordion accordion" >

pages.title: American Express

sections.text: FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA
We recommend installing at least ten of these 2.5-inch louver vents for each AdaptAIR vent on your container.
Very simple to install. Use a 2.5-inch carbide-tipped hole saw to drill a hole. Pop in the louver vents and press the tabs on the inside wall to keep it in place.
These vents can be installed a few inches above the floor evenly spaced on the sidewalls.

These vents use a .020-gauge aluminum for our round aluminum louvers, screens and plugs - most manufacturers use a thinner gauge, which leads to a weaker product. This thick, durable material maximizes lifespan and ensures proper ventilation needs.
We offer all of the essentials for energy savings and are geared towards maximizing ventilation capacity.
© 2026 Container Creations, All rights reserved.

<div class="product-short-description rte" ><h4><strong><meta charset="utf-8">These intake vents fit on the vertical ribs of your shipping container walls to provide airflow for your AdaptAIR™ roof ventilation. </strong></h4>
<p><strong><meta charset="utf-8">We recommend installing at least ten of these 2.5-inch louver vents for each AdaptAIR vent on your container. </strong></p>
<p>Very simple to install. Use a <strong>2.5-inch carbide-tipped hole saw</strong> to drill a hole. Pop in the louver vents and press the tabs on the inside wall to keep it in place.</p>
<p>These vents can be installed a few inches above the floor evenly spaced on the sidewalls.</p>
<p>These vents use a .020-gauge aluminum for our round aluminum louvers, screens and plugs - most manufacturers use a thinner gauge, which leads to a weaker product. This thick, durable material maximizes lifespan and ensures proper ventilation needs.</p></div><collapsible-row class="product__accordion accordion" >

pages.title: American Express

sections.text: FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA
24 CURVED BLADES deliver powerful airflow capture while protecting against rain and water entry. **Compare to the industry standard of 21 blades fans.

THICKENED 201 STAINLESS STEEL for the highest-rated durability and resistance to rust and corrosion. You can feel the difference compared to other turbines.**Compare to the industry standard of galvanized steel.
PRECISION COLLAR designed to fit precisely on the AdaptAIR™ vent adapter with (3) mounting screw holes.
PERMANENTLY LUBRICATED BEARINGS are maintenance-free and designed to enable near fiction-less spin with the lightest of breeze.
SELF-TAPPING MOUNT SCREWS are included to easily affix the turbine to your AdaptAIR™ vent adapter.
WIND SPEED = CUBIC FEET PER MINUTE:3.5 mph = 470 CFM5 mph wind = 1236 CFM7.5 mph breeze = 1471 CFM10 mph = 1650 CFM
We offer all of the essentials for energy savings and are geared towards maximizing ventilation capacity.
© 2026 Container Creations, All rights reserved.

<div class="product-short-description rte" ><h4 data-mce-fragment="1">Container Creations designed this custom 12-inch stainless steel wind-powered turbine vent to be the best performing shipping container ventilator on the market for our AdaptAIR™ product.</h4>
<p data-mce-fragment="1"><strong>24 CURVED BLADES </strong>deliver powerful airflow capture while protecting against rain and water entry. <br><em>**Compare to the industry standard of 21 blades fans.</em></p>
<p data-mce-fragment="1"><strong>THICKENED 201 STAINLESS STEEL</strong> for the highest-rated durability and resistance to rust and corrosion. You can feel the difference compared to other turbines.<br><meta charset="utf-8"><em>**Compare to the industry standard of galvanized steel.</em><br></p>
<p data-mce-fragment="1"><em> </em><strong>PRECISION COLLAR</strong> designed to fit precisely on the <a href="https://www.containercreations.com/products/shipping-container-roof-vent-adapter" target="_blank">AdaptAIR™ vent adapter</a> with (3) mounting screw holes.</p>
<p data-mce-fragment="1"><strong>PERMANENTLY LUBRICATED BEARINGS</strong> are maintenance-free and designed to enable near fiction-less spin with the lightest of breeze.</p>
<p data-mce-fragment="1"><meta charset="utf-8"><strong>SELF-TAPPING MOUNT SCREWS</strong> are included to easily affix the turbine to your AdaptAIR™ vent adapter.</p>
<p class="p1"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>WIND SPEED = CUBIC FEET PER MINUTE:<br></strong></span>3.5 mph = 470 CFM<br>5 mph wind = 1236 CFM<br>7.5 mph breeze = 1471 CFM<br>10 mph = 1650 CFM</p></div><collapsible-row class="product__accordion accordion" >
